title: High scorers
question: Write a query to fetch all students who scored more than 80 marks.
hint: Look for table name 'students' and column 'marks' (if available).

title: Recent employees
question: List all employees who joined after 2020-01-01.
hint: Use a date column like 'joining_date' or 'joined_on'.

title: Top salaries
question: Fetch the top 5 employees with the highest salary.
hint: ORDER BY salary DESC and LIMIT or ROWNUM depending on DB.
sample: SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 5;
